body:
The true fix for this workaround is here:

https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/43b0af1f9a03d38d5296bda378c299e80a7075b1

It happens to be in a commit that is a few commits ahead of the one that is being discussed here. You can cherry-pick/merge that one directly (I believe we only need the one line change in 
` unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/src/Tensor/TensorFunctors.h `) and that ought to remove the need for the patch file.

body_text:
The true fix for this workaround is here:
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/43b0af1f9a03d38d5296bda378c299e80a7075b1
It happens to be in a commit that is a few commits ahead of the one that is being discussed here. You can cherry-pick/merge that one directly (I believe we only need the one line change in
unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/src/Tensor/TensorFunctors.h) and that ought to remove the need for the patch file.
